p: For the synthesis of luminescent CuInS 2 (CIS) NCs a protocol reported earlier by Li et al.( 66) was adapted. Briefly, 297 mg of In(Ac) 3, 191 mg of CuI, and 5 mL of DDT were mixed and degassed under vacuum for 1 h at 80 °C. The reaction mixture was then heated under N 2 flow to 230 °C and allowed to react for 100 min. The reaction was stopped by removing the heating mantle. The NCs were precipitated with a methanol/butanol 1/1 mixture and, after centrifugation and decanting the supernatant, dispersed in 10 mL of toluene.
